name: Pandemic Rush (Supantha Paul)
description:
This game is made with a focus on the theme : "2020". In this game, we have focused on how people bought essentials in bulk (although we strongly condemn such behaviors). In the game itself, the player is supposed to stock essentials like toilet papers, sanitizers, and food items. Also, the player is equipped with a unique mask gun which allows him to "shoot" other people with masks in order to stop them for a small amount of time from stocking supplies.

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D - Move
Mouse - Look Around
CTRL - Slide
SPACE - Jump
F - Grab/Use
Left Click - Shoot Masks
TAB - View Inventory

CREDITS

The game is made by Supantha Paul(Twitter) and Deepargh Chatterjee(Twitter)

All the art assets are made by us (except the character models, which were also heavily modified). All sounds and music are Non-copyright.

KNOWN BUGS

There is a bit of jitter when hopping on the shopping cart. This bug occurred at the last moment and is being investigated.
